ai

Class AbstractSimpleAIComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.AbstractSimpleAIComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChainable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentActionAIComponent, AgentAI, AgentAngleAIComponent, AgentLocationAIComponent, AgentVelocityAIComponent, BallLocationAIComponent, BoundryCheckAIComponent, GameState, GoalLocationAIComponent, HomeAreaAIComponent, MovementAreaAIComponent, PlayersLocationAIComponent, PlayModeAIComponent

    public abstract class AbstractSimpleAIComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IChainable
    This abstract class is used to build AI Components which process EnvironmentModels synchronously. It provides one abstract method which accepts an EnvironmentModel needs to return an EnvironmentModel. Created by raghavnarula on 03/11/2015.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(EnvironmentModel model)
        This method takes the model it is given and passes it to processModel, which in turn returns a model. If this instance of IChainable has a next set, then the model is passed on the the next component in the chain. Note, this method is synchronous and will not return until all synchronous components in the chain have processed the model.
        Specified by:
        put in interface IChainable
        Parameters:
        model - The model to be processed.
